attributes.action: ensure an adequate train service to/from Ashchurch for Tewkesbury station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Throughout most of the day the train service interval is only one train every 2 hours.
 Tewkesbury is only 40 miles from Birmingham and 90 miles from London but services are inadequate particularly for making the return journey in the same day.

rejection.details: Please contact your local train service in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
